text: Nangenxa (yokuqhayisa) bathi: “Sambulala uMesiya u’Isâ (uYesu) unyana kaMaryam, uMthunywa ka-Allâh, kodwa bengazanga bambulale, bengazanga bambethelela nasemnqamlezweni, koko imfano (imbonakalo) ka’Isâ (yaba kumntu wumbi), ke abo bakuphikisayo oku bazele ziintandabuzo, abalandeli nto yimbi ngaphandle koqash- qash, kuba ngenene, abazanga bambulale
